metadata.content_summary: Comprehensive STING platform documentation including guides, API reference, use cases with metrics, marketplace monetization, integration examples, and detailed PII detection specifications

changes: Added comprehensive Report Generation System documentation
Documented long-form report generation, PDF export, queue management, and timeout configuration
Added Use Cases & Real-World Metrics with quantifiable results across 8 industries
Documented Marketplace & Knowledge Monetization with 85/15 revenue sharing model
Added Integration Examples for healthcare EHR (Epic, FHIR), IoT/MQTT, financial systems, and OpenAI-compatible APIs
Created detailed PII Detection & Data Privacy System documentation covering 50+ entity types
Documented compliance profiles for HIPAA, GDPR, CCPA, FERPA, and PCI-DSS
Added practical code examples in Python, JavaScript, and cURL for all integrations
Included performance benchmarks, accuracy metrics, and troubleshooting guides
Total document count increased from 5 to 9 comprehensive guides
Documented 30+ REST API endpoints with examples
Added authentication flow examples (Python, JavaScript, cURL)
Added request/response samples for all endpoints

usage_notes: This package provides summaries optimized for Bee Chat responses
For complete technical details, reference the source documentation in /docs/
Package is designed for semantic search and AI question-answering
Update version when significant documentation changes occur
